name: Smart Alto
headline: Easiest way to set appointments with real estate leads

founders.name: Hassan Riggs, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Hassan Riggs is a the founder of Smart Alto - the easiest way to turn real estate leads into quality appointments. 
He is a former inside sales agent, current Forbes contributor and digital marketer who has sold more than $100 million dollars in products. He has a passion for getting new clients from try to buy as fast as possible and building stronger relationships through digital marketing. He graduated from Columbia University in the City of New York.

## List More Homes:
# 58% Of Buyers Have A Home To Sell. We Show You Who They Are.
Give us 2 minutes and we'll find the buyers in your database with a home to sell and automate your seller email outreach.
[Show me how](http://www.smartalto.com/<#>)[Get a Demo](http://www.smartalto.com/<#>)
Industry Leading Property Intelligence Software

## Use Cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/646c978fc2344eff44823780_x-bold%20\(7\).svg)
A few creative ways to evaluate properties, generate leads, and automate marketing using Smart Alto. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/65c0cdfed339b7de3047de0b_headset-duotone.svg)
#### Conversational AI
Call motivated sellers and make live transfers, daily
Coming Soon
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/65d4a2949c8b3d9f2ae4d972_eye-slash-duotone.svg)
#### Hidden Listings
58% of all buyers have a home to sell. Use AI to find Listings Hiding in Plain Sight
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/6470ad89deace073b876b3b3_key-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Absentee Owners
Talk to in-state or out-of-state property owners to help them cash in on their asset.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/649c21a12b64748805c5b560_subtract-duotone.svg)
#### Homeowner vs Renter
Separate the homeowners vs renters in your database
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4f80fe52cbfcc08b1ce_package-duotone%20\(2\).svg)
#### Gen Z Movers
Find owners between 24-32 years old who have lived in their homes 2-5 years. They represent 71% of movers in that age range.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb502c1fc981b9e413308_users-three-duotone%20\(3\).svg)
#### Millennials Movers
Find owners between 33-42 year olds who have lived in their house for four to 10 years. They represent 66% of movers in that age range.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4ca74dc9b98d83e1eb3_magnifying-glass-duotone%20\(2\).svg)
#### Property Evaluation
Quickly evaluate properties to find the best opportunities to grow your business with industry-leading data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4e3ec1fdd0b82927e6b_arrows-in-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Senior Downsizers
Connect with empty nesters who live in two stories homes and may want to downsize.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb65027e036a2727d7566_target-duotone%20\(3\).svg)
#### Niche Based Listings
More than 60% of total home sales came from these four groups: veterans, single females, multigenerational households, and senior citizens.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb7c1da9f4f67a9c65184_chat-circle-text-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Personalizing Your Messages
Make your outreach personal and relevant by including the address, bd/ba, school district name or 50+ other variables in your message.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/6470aedc2718a7b0dd3849a6_megaphone-duotone.svg)
#### Promoting Your Listings
Share your new listing with homeowners in nearby neighborhoods to encourage more selling activity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4d73548475c79b7124f_tag-duotone%20\(3\).svg)
#### Sphere Marketing
Stay in touch with your sphere and inner circle with home value emails, neighborhood event reminders, and GIF emails.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb62b79fbb9a858ea252a_path-duotone%20\(2\).svg)
#### A/B Test
Discover which message or headline or angle works best for different property owners with A/B test.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb63b354847d396b73587_list-checks-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Automate Your Follow-ups
Ensure consistent and timely sales outreach across email, SMS, phone and social media by automating your tasks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/6470af2ca61024d9b3306e1c_envelope-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Monthly Home Value Emails
Establish yourself as an authority by sending home value emails and SMS to property owners in your area.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb66f705da24e7fb94292_cake-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Home Anniversary Messages
Remind homeowners they don’t pay capital gains tax on the first $250k if they lived in their home the past two years.

A few creative ways to evaluate properties, generate leads, and automate marketing using Smart Alto. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/65c0cdfed339b7de3047de0b_headset-duotone.svg)
#### Conversational AI
Call motivated sellers and make live transfers, daily

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/65d4a2949c8b3d9f2ae4d972_eye-slash-duotone.svg)
#### Hidden Listings
58% of all buyers have a home to sell. Use AI to find Listings Hiding in Plain Sight
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/6470ad89deace073b876b3b3_key-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Absentee Owners
Talk to in-state or out-of-state property owners to help them cash in on their asset.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/649c21a12b64748805c5b560_subtract-duotone.svg)
#### Homeowner vs Renter
Separate the homeowners vs renters in your database
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4f80fe52cbfcc08b1ce_package-duotone%20\(2\).svg)
#### Gen Z Movers
Find owners between 24-32 years old who have lived in their homes 2-5 years. They represent 71% of movers in that age range.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb502c1fc981b9e413308_users-three-duotone%20\(3\).svg)
#### Millennials Movers
Find owners between 33-42 year olds who have lived in their house for four to 10 years. They represent 66% of movers in that age range.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4ca74dc9b98d83e1eb3_magnifying-glass-duotone%20\(2\).svg)
#### Property Evaluation
Quickly evaluate properties to find the best opportunities to grow your business with industry-leading data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4e3ec1fdd0b82927e6b_arrows-in-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Senior Downsizers
Connect with empty nesters who live in two stories homes and may want to downsize.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb65027e036a2727d7566_target-duotone%20\(3\).svg)
#### Niche Based Listings
More than 60% of total home sales came from these four groups: veterans, single females, multigenerational households, and senior citizens.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb7c1da9f4f67a9c65184_chat-circle-text-duotone%20\(1\).svg)
#### Personalizing Your Messages
Make your outreach personal and relevant by including the address, bd/ba, school district name or 50+ other variables in your message.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/6470aedc2718a7b0dd3849a6_megaphone-duotone.svg)
#### Promoting Your Listings
Share your new listing with homeowners in nearby neighborhoods to encourage more selling activity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb4d73548475c79b7124f_tag-duotone%20\(3\).svg)

Stay in touch with your sphere and inner circle with home value emails, neighborhood event reminders, and GIF emails.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb62b79fbb9a858ea252a_path-duotone%20\(2\).svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/645cb63b354847d396b73587_list-checks-duotone%20\(1\).svg)

Ensure consistent and timely sales outreach across email, SMS, phone and social media by automating your tasks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6453b934c97d29bb5288dcc7/6470af2ca61024d9b3306e1c_envelope-duotone%20\(1\).svg)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Smart Alto**

Smart Alto is a tech startup aimed at revolutionizing the way real estate leads set appointments. Based in Birmingham, Alabama, and part of Y Combinator's W17 batch, this nimble team of eight employees is on a mission to make it incredibly easy for real estate professionals to engage with potential clients.

### Mission
Smart Alto's goal is clear: to simplify and enhance the appointment-setting process for real estate leads. They understand that timely and effective communication can be the difference between closing a deal or losing an opportunity.

### Features and Offerings
Smart Alto provides industry-leading features designed to streamline the real estate process:

1. **Property Intelligence**: Access free property, mortgage, and consumer data.
2. **Property Evaluation**: Quickly evaluate properties to identify profitable opportunities.
3. **Lead Generation**: Build targeted prospecting lists faster than ever.
4. **Sales Automation**: Create multi-channel outreach sequences to maintain engagement.
5. **AI Data Enrichment**: Automatically fill in missing data on leads to facilitate contact.
6. **Personalized Marketing**: Automatically send tailored messages leveraging more than 50 variables to enhance relevance.
7. **Appointment Setters**: Automate the booking of appointments directly on your calendar.

With robust features like SMS & Email Marketing, A/B Testing, and a Command Center to manage tasks efficiently, Smart Alto equips real estate agents with the tools they need to amplify their outreach.

### User Testimonials
Users have praised Smart Alto as a "game changer" in their operations, expressing satisfaction with both the platform and the support provided. They'll often talk about the ease of mining their databases and the immediate effectiveness seen after signing up.

### The Future
Smart Alto is continuously evolving, with upcoming features like Conversational AI and integrations with AI tools like ChatGPT to further enhance user experience.

For those in the real estate industry looking to elevate their lead engagement approach, Smart Alto is positioned as an invaluable resource, combining technology and user-friendly design to transform how appointments are set and managed. To explore more, visit their official website at [smartalto.com](http://www.smartalto.com).
